SQL.LOAD: SELECT vsc_plan_id, dealer_id, dealer_group_id, version_number, effective_date, expiration_date, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, vsc_rate_version_id FROM elp_vsc_rate_version WHERE vsc_rate_version_id = :vsc_rate_version_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select rv.VSC_RATE_VERSION_ID, p.code PlanCode, p.Description PLAN, d.dealer DealerCode, d.Dealer_Name DealerName, dg.code DealerGroupCode, dg.DESCRIPTION DealerGroup, rv.Version_Number VERSION, rv.EFFECTIVE_DATE, rv.EXPIRATION_DATE, (select max(Version_Number) from ELP_VSC_RATE_VERSION where vsc_plan_id = rv.vsc_plan_id and nvl(dealer_group_id, '0') = nvl(rv.dealer_group_id, '0') and nvl(dealer_id, '0') = nvl(rv.dealer_id, '0') ) HighestVersion, ROWNUM FROM ELP_VSC_RATE_VERSION rv join elp_vsc_plan p on rv.vsc_plan_id = p.vsc_plan_id left join ELP_DEALER_GROUP dg on rv.dealer_group_id = dg.dealer_group_id left outer join ELP_DEALER d on rv.dealer_id = d.dealer_id where p.company_Group_id = :company_group_id --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY PLAN, DealerGroup, DEALER, VERSION Desc
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_vsc_rate_version SET vsc_plan_id = :vsc_plan_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, dealer_group_id = :dealer_group_id, version_number = :version_number, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE vsc_rate_version_id = :vsc_rate_version_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_vsc_rate_version ( vsc_plan_id, dealer_id, dealer_group_id, version_number, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, vsc_rate_version_id ) VALUES ( :vsc_plan_id, :dealer_id, :dealer_group_id, :version_number, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :created_by, :vsc_rate_version_id )
